An advanced version of [[Ice Release: Black Dragon Blizzard]] in which Dotō releases two dragons of black snow that merge into a massive tornado. This technique manipulates existing ice instead of creating ice.

[[es:Elemento Hielo: Ráfaga del Doble Dragón]]
[[pl:Hyōton: Sōryū Bōfūsetsu]]
